description:
Package contains a helper functions installed as Chocolatey extensions. These functions are used by other Devbox-Common installers, and are usually used internally by Chocolatey engine.

      Let's mention some of a newly defined shared functions: Show-AppUninstallInfo, Stop-OnAppIsInstalled, Remove-Path, Set-PathCleanup, Remove-EnvironmentVariable, Get-RootPath, Find-FileInEnvPath, Test-FileInEnvPath, etc.

      NOTE: This package contains a valid automatic uninstall procedure, so you don't need to manually reverse whatever actions installer did.
      NOTE: Phrase « Devbox » in a name of this package is used as signature to indicate high quality standards. Functionally, the package is the same as any other Chocolatey package.
summary: Helper Functions packed as Chocolatey extension
author: Michael Field
